COVID-19 大流行限制如何影响侵袭性脑膜炎球菌疾病趋势？ COVID-19 大流行限制对脑膜炎球菌的发病率和菌株分布的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/How-did-COVID-19-pandemic-restrictions-impact-guarantee-meningococcal-disease-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/How-did-COVID-19-pandemic-restrictions-impact-guarantee-meningococcal-disease-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60a65bf3-9ad2-454d-b7e7-34d2b29d7405 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:12:00 -0400 How did COVID-19 pandemic restrictions impact invasive meningococcal disease trends?
支气管扩张患者痰液颜色可提示肺部炎症程度根据在意大利米兰举行的欧洲呼吸学会国际大会上发表的新研究，肺部疾病支气管扩张症患者的痰液颜色可以表明肺部炎症程度并预测其未来的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Color-of-the-phlegm-can-indicate- Degree-of-lung-inflammation-in-病人-with-bronchiectasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Color-of-the-phlegm-can-indicate- Degree-of-lung-inflammation-in-病人-with-bronchiectasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10d40a84-fafd-4830-97fe-1ea709cdb3bd Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:07:43 -0400 Color of the phlegm can indicate degree of lung inflammation in patients with bronchiectasis
有针对性的饮食和运动干预可以改善乳腺癌患者的化疗结果耶鲁大学癌症中心的一项新研究发现，有针对性的饮食和运动干预可以改善接受乳腺癌化疗的女性的预后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Targeted-diet-and-exercise-intervention-could-improve-chemotherapy-outcomes-for-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/Targeted-diet-and-exercise-intervention-could-improve-chemotherapy-outcomes-for-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63cea44e-3024-454d-8116-15cc4bf07898 Mon, 11 Sep 2023 08:03:22 -0400 Targeted diet and exercise intervention could improve chemotherapy outcomes for breast cancer patients

一位父亲梦想为家人拥有一个家。医疗债务几乎让他们流落街头。凯斯·阿滕西奥 (Kayce Atencio) 在丹佛市中心的无家可归者收容所工作时，常常被一个想法所困扰。 “也可能是我，”30 岁的阿滕西奥说，他和儿子、女儿住在离避难所不远的一间小公寓里。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/A-father-dreamed-of-a-home-for-his-family-Medical-debt-nearly-pushed-them-onto-the-streets。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230911/A-father-dreamed-of-a-home-for-his-family-Medical-debt-nearly-pushed-them-onto-the-streets。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eba6385f-78d8-4d73-8a5b-41c883792e7c Mon, 11 Sep 2023 07:33:54 -0400 A father dreamed of a home for his family. Medical debt nearly pushed them onto the streets.
